text: You can craft various items by placing correct items in the ingredient slots. Each crafting attempt costs 5 gold, but your ingredients are lost only on successful attempts. All known recipes are stored in the recipes view and unlocking more is a surefire way to increase your crafting potential.
label: n

text: The recipes discovered through investigation are not added in your recipes list. This is a bug, as stated in the related article on the Paradox Interactive support site
label: n
